about_the_game:
Card Coder merges tactical card battles, inventory management and roguelike deck-building with a novel twist: Create your own custom cards during each run with an intuitive loadout system per card. Defeat challenging enemies to loot, shop and collect many different ability components. Slot them into your cards to define their behavior according to your playstyle:

      

  • Choose a trigger to set the event that will cause this card to act: On Play; On Begin Turn; Whenever another card is played; etc.

  • Define a condition to be fulfilled or an activation cost to be paid, before this card can act: Pay 1 energy; Wait for cooldown; Check if this card has full health; etc.

  • Add a selector to decide which cards will be targeted: Select self; Select all enemy cards; Select commander, etc.

  • Mix and match one or two effects that will be applied to all targeted cards: Deal 1 damage; Heal 1 hitpoint; Apply status “vulnerable”; Move the card to another location; Destroy the target; Return card to hand; Reduce cooldown; etc.

The energy cost of each card is then automatically balanced based on how powerful your created abilities are.

This card-building approach allows you to create more than 10 billion different cards and you’ll discover incredible synergies within your cards and powerful combos across your cards. Use everything to your advantage and crush your enemies in challenging rogue-like runs, high-stakes gauntlets and other game-modes to be unlocked.

Features

  • Beyond deckbuilding: Create your own cards as you play by combining triggers, conditions, selectors and effects! Over 10 billion possibilities. Build your cards to fit your playstyle -- not the other way round!

  • Tactical, grid-less combat: Manipulate enemy cards' targeting aggro by placing your cards freely on the board. Take advantage of superior positioning.

  • Meta Progression

    • Unlock new ability components and base cards after each run to grow your card-creation possibilities from several thousands to several billions.

    • Discover new combat locations with unique gameplay modifiers that can turn the tides of battle.

    • Beat new game modes like constructed gauntlet or random draft gauntlet.

  • Cosmetic card customization: The card-building aspect of Card Coder does not stop at scripting the mechanics. To make cards memorable and easy to distinguish in battle you can also customize the visuals of each card: Change the title, adjust the color tint, select awesome artwork from different pixel artists or even replace the card's artwork with any custom image you choose.

  • Upgrade the rarity of ability components by merging duplicates to gain stats bonuses and powerful status auras.

  • Discover unique recipes: Certain combinations of ability components provide an additional bonus.

  • Addicting gameloop: Fight an opponent, gain rewards, go shopping and create new and better cards to improve your deck. Face the next opponent until you beat the Big Bad.

  • No MTX / IAP / DLC: Card Coder is a buy once, play forever game. There will never be any in-game microtransactions / purchases, pay-to-win mechanics, premium cosmetics, online or 3rd party account requirements nor any paid DLC. Everything is already included in the game or will be added via free future updates.

Wishlist Card Coder now and get a notification the moment it becomes available!
